message.body: Do we have canisters for sugar and flour?
Also do we have measuring cups and spoons?
No canisters, yes measuring things but not more than like a cup or something
Cool I will try and pick some up
Also I have a bookcase here. Do you think you would want one in the living room/do you think we have the space?

If you have one already then we definitely have space for it. If you're thinking about buying one its up to you...I don't need it and there's the shelf under the coffee table but it could be useful to have
Yeah I already have one
I will bring it with me when we come down then
Awesome :)
I am bringing home so many cookbooks
Haha okay :)
Also may bring a papasan chair for the living room
Hey Lizzy! So Anna might stay over tonight...when are you getting here tomorrow, and how does that work with your parents coming (or does it not matter)?
We could get there as early as 10am but no later. It is tots fine if Anna is there!
Sweet. Also do you have a casserole dish?
No unfortunately :(
So Anna is breaking up with me
What?! Omg I am so sorry I just got this
Are you still awake/do you want to talk??
Becca is here and when she leaves I will probably just go to bed. I'm mostly trying to keep myself distracted. I will see you tomorrow!
Ok sounds good. Please let me know if you need anything. You are one of my favorite people and in a few weeks it will feel better I promise though I know it feels like shit now
Thanks <3
Guess who left her fancy sunglasses here
Someone who probably isn't going to get them back now?
Hahahaha if she wants them she can come get them and deal with that awkwardness
#breakupfail
Seems fair. Or we can give them to a homeless person or wipe our butts with them or make a bonfire of which they are part
Or you know be mature or whatever

I was considering smashing them with a hammer or throwing them at the side of the house
But I might just be mature or whatever
I think the hammer smashing is tots legit. I mean, she really should have thought it through if she didn't want that to happen to them
Seriously
But actually, do whatever would make you feel best with the glasses. Fuck what she would think
I'm not currently feeling vindictive enough to give her that kind of fuck you...they were really expensive
Like if she was cheating on me I would smash them
That makes sense. You could always send them if you didn't want to see her, or have her pick them up when you're not home
Yeah I'm not gonna put in the effort to send them or do scheduling. If she wants them she can come get them. Ill figure out leaving them outside vs. opening the door and handing them to her later
FYI my dad my sister and I are going to dinner tonight at Local 44. You are invited if you are interested!
Also we should get to the apt more like noon, give or take
Sure! And ok. I don't know when they are heading out but want to go to bed bath and beyond tomorrow maybe?
Sure! I should be free from when after our couch is delivered tomorrow (at 10ish) until I need to cook communal dinner in the late afternoon
Also I think we should be getting to local 44 earlyish (3:30 or 4) and are going to stick around for a couple hours if that helps your Saturday planning
I mean I wouldn't want you to start a new season of something and then have to leave, that would be cruel
What plans haha...bed? Ice cream? Netflix?
Haha okay fair. Any suggestions of what I should watch? I never watch tv so I have no idea
Hm. I am currently obsessed with mad about you (a 90s sitcom of which I am bringing home the first season). Mad Men is highly addictive, and Big Bang theory is good for a laugh
I also watch too much New Girl but wouldn't actually recommend it
In my room dozing off. However, should probably not actually go to bed at 8:15 so if you want to watch some episodes of something let me know
Don't worry about waking me up if that is what happens
